price: 9. Jie sakys: „Taip, perspėtojas atėjo pas mus, tačiau mes neigėme ir sakėme: „Allahas nieko nesiuntė. Tu esi tik dideliame paklydime.“
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٞ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū balā qad jāanā nadhīrun fakadhabnā waqul'nā mā nazzala al-lahu min shayin in antum illā fī ḍalālin kabīrin
